document.title: Reference Lexicon for Belgian-Dutch (RBBN)
document.intro: The Reference Lexicon for Belgian-Dutch is a monolingual lexicon of Belgian-Dutch, containing ca. 4.000 entries (lemmas). The RBBN contains only those words which have a specific meaning in Belgian-Dutch or appear only in Belgian-Dutch. If possible, the description is related to the Nor... Belgian-Dutch; Dutch as spoken in Flanders

access.title: available for non-commercial and commercial organisations; user licence required
